text.exordium.title: Exordium
text.exordium.enableNametagScreenBufferi: Enable/Disable buffering nametags on the screen
text.exordium.targetFPSNameTags.tooltip: The target framerate for nametags on the screen
text.exordium.setting.chat.fps.tooltip: The maximum framerate for the chat overlay

text.exordium.setting.hotbar.fps.tooltip: The maximum framerate for the hotbar
text.exordium.setting.experience.fps.too: The maximum framerate for the experience bar/level number
text.exordium.setting.experience.enabled: Enable/Disable buffering the experience bar/level number
text.exordium.setting.scoreboard.fps.too: The maximum framerate for the scoreboard
